abstrac: Always by your side, working side by side.
bio:
Weyebi COM is a Government Contractor specializing in Desktop Support Engineering, computer repair, Networking, desktop publishing, CAD drafting and a cyber-security consulting. We are experienced in multiple computer-related fields in as much as we have been doing virus removal, OS repairs, migration, windows deployment, computer hardware upgrade, internet security, and so much more for years (our clients range from non-profits and professionals to businesses and churches). Here is a non-exhaustive list of our fields of action:

Operating Systems Deployment & Upgrades
Virus & Malware Removal
Performance Enhancement
Hardware Upgrades
Software Updates
System Customization
Desktop Support
Technical Support
Outlook & Other tools Configuration and Management
Computer Repair & Refurbishing

Private Networks Setup and Management
Cloud Integration
Internet Security
Email setup and Management
Online and Offline Database Management
We are open Monday, Tuesday and Saturday 7:00AM to 10:00PM and from Wednesday to Friday 7:00AM to 9:00PM. We accept credits cards, checks and cash.

abstrac: Making Success Happen--One Client at at Time
bio: What difference can over 40 Years of experience across various phases of business offer you in your choice of a Consultant?  Let me share that It offers a HUGE difference in performance, in opportunity and in results attained.  Our business development experience over the years has allowed unfettered access to multiple funding sources and projects around the world. If we work with you, we offer the necessary business expertise as well as the opportunity for financing and packaging opportunities.  In the professional arena, clients have shared that they consider our expertise in change management and Due Diligence/Analysis to be important to their business results achieved.  I've been named a Fellow in the International Centre for Consulting Excellence. We seek out ways to help train those around us to do what we do so that there is no shortfall after our Consult is completed. We offer opportunities for involvement between our clients, wherever possible, because synergy exists at all levels, and introductions between great clients may lead to additional opportunities for both clients.  That's a win-win.

Guru.com offers a platform for payment that is comfortable, reasonable in cost, and easy to use.  We use Guru.com Escrow for all first time clients. We use Guru.com Safe Pay Invoice for those clients who have established a payment history with us. We use Guru.com Arbitration for cases where clients elect not to pay for work product we have agreed upon, either in scope or in content.  We offer a timeframe for completion of projects with a guaranteed commitment and completion date.  You will know when your project starts, and when we expect your project to conclude.  If we are developing business or marketing plans, we offer both stellar experiences and references, but we can't guarantee funding or success based solely on your use of our plan, because once the project leaves our control, many variables exist which will impact on whether or not the project is funded or implemented.   We do offer introductions to funding sources who may be interested in funding plans for business development or expansion opportunities. When you pay us, your plan is yours to execute. It's your work product.  Please watch our video below for more information on who we are, what we do, and how it can positively impact you. And thanks for your interest in The Guinn Consultancy Group, Inc.

bio:
I have over 30 years experience in both Hardware and Software engineering.  I have worked for a number of major companies - Intel, Motorola, Honeywell, Subcontracted to the Department Of Defense(DOD). I have also worked for medium size businesses in the area of custom Accounting Applications, and with Intuit's QuickBooks (desktop application and Online WEB application) plus Intuit's Merchant account SDK.I will provide a current resume upon request.
Consulting firm which specializes in Databases, Accounting Applications, and Scientific Real-Time Applications with an additional speciality in Digital Hardware design.

Network IV, Inc does work on a Corp to Corp and on a Time/Material basis.  All work is invoiced weekly and due upon receiptAll my work is guaranteed to work within the parameters of my client's specifications/requirements.  The work is done at my office and installations can be done in person if the client is in the Phoenix AZ area, otherwise PC Anywhere or GoToMyPC is used to install and integrate software on the client's systems.Buy-offs are done with respect to the client's specifications/requirements.
